title: S12 Ep169: Seances & Haunted Items
itunes:title: Seances & Haunted Items
description:
Tim Shaw has seen it all, he is an investigator, researcher and medium who approaches the paranormal with skepticism and questions. The religion of Spiritualism can be traced back in Tim's family to the late 1800's.

Tonight we discuss the belief in Seances and Haunted Items and hear a few of Tim's most chilling experiences.

https://www.facebook.com/tim.shaw.568?ref=br_rs

http://www.seanthomasproductions.com/
